section.heading: Payments not subject to District tax.
section.text: Relocation and housing assistance payments are not income to the recipient for purposes of the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act of 1947 (§ 47-1801.01 et seq.).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Reenactment of Law 3-86: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3401.01.
